jobs.title: Training Centre Coordinator
jobs.jobDescription: Job App Kenya seeks a highly qualified Training Centre Coordinator to run/support the Training Centre and to provide training services for clients and employees. The role will include responsibility for ensuring that there is adequate and suitable training materials & schedules.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Promote the Training Centre to consultants, contractors, customers, Engineers and employees, Prepare and execute training programs
Receive and coordinate booking of courses by customers

jobRequirements.req: Minimum 4-5 years’ experience in the electrical engineering field

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.jobDescription: Help A Child International is the secretariat to the HelpAge Global Network, which brings together a wide range of organisations and individuals working to promote the rights and meet the needs of older women and men, nationally and/or internationally.Our long-term vision is to establish a global movement of strong connected age focused and older people led platforms in every country in the world.HelpAge International Kenya Country programme seeks to recruit a Finance Officer who will be responsible for maintaining sound financial and accounting systems, ensuring internal controls, processing payments, filing and document retrieval, providing data for report preparation and data input for both Kenya and Africa Regional office.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Ensure that all financial transactions are carried out and recorded in accordance with IAS and HelpAge International procedures and policies.
Cash flow management and bank reconciliation for Kenya and ARO accounts,
Reviewing Travel Expense Reports (TERs) for accuracy before approval by Line Managers

jobRequirements.req: Bachelors degree in Marketing from a recognized institution
Advanced Certificate and Postgraduate Diploma in Marketing desirable
Experience in all aspects of developing and managing marketing strategies.
Relevant product and industry knowledge for a minimum of 3 years.

jobs.title: Project Management Officer
jobs.jobDescription: Hivi Sasa is an international organisation that seeks new solutions to persistent global issues. With smart projects in the right places, we oppose discrimination, inequality, abuse of power and the unsustainable use of our planet’s resources. Counterbalance alone, however, is not enough. Our primary focus is achieving structural change. This is why we cooperate with innovative businesses, citizens and their organisations. We share a dream with them of sustainable economies and inclusive societies.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Voice grant making criteria, principles and processes
Provide technical support as needed to potential grantees in the formulation of grant applications

jobRequirements.req: 5 years experience with large scale grant management
Knowledge of and affinity with social inclusion, marginalisation, lobby & advocacy
Relevant Academic background (MA level) or similar

jobs.title: Refrigeration Technician
jobs.jobDescription: Our client in a dairy industry in Nakuru is looking to recruit a refrigeration technician who is experienced in ammonia compressor/ refrigeration (ammonia)/ cooling towers and chillers.

jobResponsibilities.responsibility: Manage the safety of the refrigerators and air conditioners
Operating tools, gauges and other testing equipment for refrigeration systems.Receive and coordinate booking of courses by customers
Trouble shooting, repair and overhaul of refrigeration systems.
Performing root cause analysis on refrigeration equipment failures to prevent reoccurrence

jobRequirements.req: Diploma in refrigeration and air conditioning from a recognized institution.
Working experience of at least 5 years.
